The following bugs in omniORB 4.0.2 have been fixed. Update from CVS to get the fixes.

Summary: Registry reading broken on Windows (bug number 1)
Date: Thu Aug 21 15:53:14 BST 2003
Fixed by: dgrisby
Reported by: Paul Keeley
Link for this bug: http://www.omniorb-support.com/pipermail/omniorb-list/2003-August/024096.html
Description: A fix to reading of the configuration file accidentally disabled reading from the registry.
